title: Introducing: DRELLER
content:
Absolutely love this debut video and song from London’s DRELLER.

Sound wise, it feels somewhere between the isolation and emotional exhaustion of How To Dress Well, and the slicker, yet equally as cutting grove of Chet Faker, and when accompanied by the stunning (I would say vaguely NSFW but c’mon, it’s animated) video done by DRELLER himself, it’s an imposing and impressive introduction. Check out One Night Stand below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
